Special thanks to various people whose software is used here:

The creators of SDL2.
The creators of SDL2_image, SDL2_mixer, and SDL2_image.
The creators of several third-party libraries, including:

Josh Coalson and Xiph.org, for libFLAC
The FreeType Project, for the freetype library
Thomas G. Lane, Guido Vollbeding, and the Independent JPEG Group, for libjpeg 
The creators of modplug
Michael Hipp and others, for mpg123
Xiph.org, for opus and opusfile, and ogg-vorbis libraries
Glenn Randers-Pehrson and many others, for libpng16
Sam Leffler and Silicon Graphics, for libtiff
Google, for libwebp
Jean-loup Gailly and Mark Adler, for zlib.
